text: Edward James "Ed" Begley, Jr. (born September 16, 1949) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor and environmentalist. He is known for his roles in; She-Devil, What's Your Number?, Whatever Works, and in Living with Ed. He is also known for his television role in St. Elsewhere. Begley, Jr. was born on September 16, 1949 in Los Angeles, CaliforniaEd Begley, Jr. Biography (1949â€“) to Ed Begley, Sr. and to Allene Jeanne Sanders. He studied at Notre Dame High School and at Los Angeles Valley College. He was married to Ingrid Taylor from 1976 until they divorced in 1989. He has now been married to Rachelle Carson since 2000. He has three children. He lives in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Ed Begley Jr.
